About Me

Hi, my name’s Karahan and I’m a Senior Linguistics student at Bogazici University I have been learning programming for the last 2 years. In this period time, I have taken several programming classes and develop a number of projects.

I want to be a NLP engineer and get a masters degree on Computer Science. Therefore I have been taken advanced classes and working voluntarily at Bogazici University TabiLab which has specialized on Natural Language Processing.

I am experienced in programming languages:

  • Python
  • Javascript
  • Kotlin
  • C++

I have worked with several libraries:

  • nltk
  • Numpy
  • Pandas
  • Matplotlib/Seaborn
  • Sklearn
  • spaCy and so on
